 basic operation, when Sms shall be displayed

Detailed Description

AbstractSmsViewerWin is the base class of all the windows which displays the content of an SMS when the user selects to view it.

Member Enumeration Documentation

Defines four variables corresponding to four SmsWindowAction members respectively.

void AbstractSmsViewerWin::OnClose (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called, if the window will get closed and represents an entry-point for cleaning up things. When the window has the focus child-controls and the window itself will lose the focus after OnClose has been executed.

Reimplemented from Window.
